short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of race entries on for up to three profiles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool that allows the user to keep a running tally of races entered on zed.run and sync data across a google account and multiple devices so that it is live.
